accounts.name: Cash
accounts.description: Cash on hand and in bank accounts.

accounts.name: Accounts Receivable
accounts.description: Money owed to the company by customers.

accounts.name: Accounts Payable
accounts.description: Money the company owes to its suppliers.

accounts.name: Owner's Equity
accounts.description: The owner's investment in the company.

accounts.name: Sales Revenue
accounts.description: Revenue from sales of goods or services.

accounts.name: Rent Expense
accounts.description: Cost of renting office or other space.
